subject: p11022245
History: Year old man with laryngeal cancer and acute respiratory failure in context of opiod use, ET tube position confirmation ET tube position confirmation.
Impression: Comparison to, 18:2The position of the right PICC line and of the endotracheal tube are stable and correct. The tip of the endotracheal tube projects approximately 5 cm above the carina.
